ICB Accounting Programme Overview

       
  • Certified Junior Bookkeeper
  • Certified Senior Bookkeeper
  • Certified Technical Financial Accountant
  • Certified Financial Accountant

MORE →

ICB Certified Junior Bookkeeper Course

SAQA ID: 58375 - National Certificate: Bookkeeping – NQF Level 3 – 120 credits ICB Membership Designation: CJBlcb (SA)

MORE →

ICB Certified Senior Bookkeeper Course

SAQA ID: 58376 – Further Education and Training Certificate: Bookkeeping – NQF Level 4 – 130 credits ICB Membership Designation: CSBlcb (SA)

Subject/Learning Area:

  • Financial Statements
  • Cost Accounting
  • Management Accounting

MORE →

ICB Certified Technical Financial Accountant Course

SAQA ID: 36213 – National Diploma:  Technical Financial Accounting – NQF Level 5 – 251 credits ICB Membership Designation: CTFAlcb (SA)

Subject/Learning Area:

  • Income Tax Returns
  • Business Law
  • Accounting Control

MORE →

ICB Certified Financial Accountant Course

SAQA ID: 20366 – National Diploma: Financial Accounting – NQF Level 6 – 280 credits ICB Membership Designation: CFAlcb (SA)

Subject/Learning Area:

  • Corporate Strategy
  • Management Accounting Control Systems
  • Financial Reporting & Regulatory Frameworks
  • Accounting Theory and Practice

MORE →

ICB Certified Public Accounts Administrator Course

National Certificate: Bookkeeping – NQF Level 4 – 120 credits ICB Membership Designation: CPAAlcb (SA)
Title with ICB Designation: Certified Public Accounts Administrator

Subject/Learning Areas:

  • Business Literacy
  • Bookkeeping to Trial Balance
  • Public Accounting Administration
  • Computerised Bookkeeping (Pastel Accounting)

MORE →

ICB Certified Technical Public Accountant Course

Diploma: Public Sector Accounting NQF L5 – SAQA ID 20353 ICB Membership Designation: CTPAIcb(SA) Title with ICB Designation: Certified Technical Public Accountant

Subjects / Learning areas:

  • Financial Statements
  • Cost and Management Accounting
  • Technical Public Accounting
  • Business Law and Accounting Control
